title: 5.0.0rc2 external storage: can't share a folder from dropbox
body:
when i log into owncloud, and mount dropbox successfully i can see all the files and folders ok.  

i cllick into one (apps) and create a new folder (testy).  this works.  i upload through the web into that folder.  this works.

i then click on the new folder testy to share it, and share it with a group users.

log out and log back in to owncloud as the user user1, a member of users.  click into shared, there is the folder testy.  click on testy and it takes me up to the shared folder again. and again.  and again.  i can't see the files inside the folder testy that i shared with this user.

a thought: where is the file owner's password stored so that user 1 can get access to the owner's file?

logs say:
